content.rendered:
About usWHO WE ARE

Brewing is our life, beer is our water so don’t waste time drinking all kind of other things which won’t make your life better.

We're in Guntersville,

Alabama

Stop by, say hello,
at our original location.
Come for the beer, stay for the laughs.

2090 Gunter Ave, Guntersville AL 35976
Mon-Thurs 3-9, Friday 3-10, Sat 12-10, Sun 12-10
(256) 960-5070
beer@mainchannelbrewing.com

Visit us in Albertville,

Alabama

Stop by, say hello,
at our second location.
Come for the beer, stay for the laughs.

210 Sand Mountain Dr, Albertville, AL 35950
Monday 3-9, Tues-Thurs 11-9, Friday 11-10, Sat 12-10,
(256) 660-0335
beer@mainchannelbrewing.com

We're in Guntersville,

Alabama

Stop by, say hello,
at our original location.
Come for the beer, stay for the laughs.

2090 Gunter Ave, Guntersville AL 35976
Mon-Thurs 3-9, Friday 3-10, Sat 12-10, Sun 12-10
(256) 960-5070
beer@mainchannelbrewing.com

Visit us in Albertville,

Alabama

Our second location,
we are open every day
from 1PM to 10PM.

210 Sand Mountain Dr, Albertville, AL 35950
Monday 3-9, Tues-Thurs 11-9, Friday 11-10, Sat 12-10
(256) 660-0335
